author: mkalen
msg: Merge with OJB_1_0_RELEASE branch: Add support for Oracle 10g JDBC-driver. Add generic unwrapping of Connection and PreparedStatement (current implementation handles large CLOB/BLOB for Oracle 10g, DBPC and P6Spy). Add (untested) support for BEA WebLogic and deprecate WLOracle9i platform.

author: mkalen
msg: Add support for Oracle 10g JDBC-driver. Add generic unwrapping of Connection and PreparedStatement (current implementation handles large CLOB/BLOB for Oracle 10g, DBPC and P6Spy). Add (untested) support for BEA WebLogic and deprecate WLOracle9i platform.

author: mkalen
msg: Merge with OJB_1_0_RELEASE branch: As suggested on ojb-user by Danilo Tommasina: change join-syntax to SQL92 for Oracle9i platform.

author: mkalen
msg: As suggested on ojb-user by Danilo Tommasina: change join-syntax to SQL92 for Oracle9i platform.
